content:
# We have successfully gathered 10 units of Stone, along with our previous inventory items.
# 
# Now that we have enough materials, we can craft a Stone Furnace, which requires 5 Stone.
# 

# Step 16: Craft the Stone Furnace
craft_item(Prototype.StoneFurnace)

# Step 17: Check the inventory after crafting the Stone Furnace
print(f'Inventory after crafting Stone Furnace: {inspect_inventory()}')
